narrative.title: 7Th Armoured Division - 1942Q2
narrative.situation: British Armoured Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q2.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armoured exploitation and breakthrough operations
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

special_rules: Deep penetration operations in open desert
